snippet: The Israeli police on Wednesday agreed to re-investigate the 2009 injury of an American activist during a clash between Israeli security forces and protesters.
abstract: Israeli police agree to re-investigate 2009 injury of American activist Tristan Anderson during a clash between Israeli security forces and protesters against the extension of Israel’s separation barrier in the West Bank.
lead_paragraph: The Israeli police on Wednesday agreed to re-investigate the 2009 injury of an American activist during a clash between Israeli security forces and protesters.

headline.main: Israel Reopens Inquiry Into Activist’s Injury
